title: [机械|娱乐|角色]Monster Apocalypse —— 怪物增强 [全版本]
txt_content:
本帖最后由 786852516 于 2013-12-22 11:58 编辑 

欢迎到最终的怪物地狱。我带来了一切的人大家可能想要做的怪物到一个完全不顾一切的插件。使用您自己的风险。警告 - 僵尸挖掘是破坏性的，如果你打开​​它，并对其进行配置，请备份你的世界。插件已经彻底的测试工作正常，如果有问题，请报告，所以我可以使它工作范围更广的设置！请使用CRAFTBUKKIT 1.6.2（任何修订）版本15.0A。没有其他版本将在此版本。捐赠怪兽启示录是由一个人，全职工作的早期发育过程持续几个月。请捐赠，如果你想看到更多的功能或新的插件版本，或只是觉得我的时间是值得你感谢。https://www.paypal.com/cgi-bin/webscr?cmd=_s-xclick&hosted_button_id=LAUYQ89CXXAXS


总的来说，这个插件就是增强了怪物的生命、伤害等等。
由于吾翻译技术过低，出错请多见谅，详细请前往原帖


特点（谷歌翻译）

完全控制所有怪物健康，伤害，物品掉落，在阳光下燃烧，爆炸半径，具体的损害类型，甚至生成速率的免疫力！消耗世界在黑暗中 - 总是夜间模式，和奖金产卵！动作RPG模式 -使战斗更精彩！令人难以置信的新的能力 -小怪爆炸死亡，产卵的盟友，杀死火把英里远，攻击速度高 ​​，轰炸基地，爆炸箭，甚至爪划伤自己的方式进入你的家！僵尸可以挖通，并没有任何根据您的设​​置服务器滞后！害怕的启示，因为他们的一斤在您的墙壁！怪物可以设置到nerdpole和登机桥，像在寻找的球员！可以设置骷髅变成地震亲狙击手，射击准确地从很远的距离！噩梦模式最终越来越大的挑战！FULL 世界卫队地区的支持，工程即使当worldguard地区是不是！总的自然产卵重写，可大幅改变你的世界，并保留，香草的感觉。将只能运行在支持多世界 - 世界，你选择！MEGA-仇恨系统 - 小怪，你可以闻英里远，攻击！刷新点- 自定义定时器设置虚拟产卵！真实伤害 - 让小怪到捅破那讨厌的钻石铠甲！的狼和僵尸猪人侵略性控制。控制块小怪产卵。权限的节点，以某些球员免疫怪物的仇恨和破坏。


config设置:CONFIG的设置（原帖）：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/monster-apocalypse/pages/config/

这里是这个插件的总体设置，个别生物的设置看“config详解”。true为启动，false为禁用。红色字体为重要
Worlds:
#该插件应用到的世界名
- world
Always night: false#总是夜晚吗
Nightmare mode multiplier: 1.0#梦魇模式乘数
Nightmare mode period: 1200000
#噩梦模式期间
Nightmare mode exponential?: true
#噩梦模式指数
Use new event system?: true
#使用新的事件系统（暂时无用）
Check for the deaggro permission for entity attacks, shooting super arrows, and mega-aggro?: false
#检查权限Apocalypse.deaggro的让玩家没有针对这些小怪
Enable natural hostile spawns?: true
#启用天然敌对生物生成
Enable natural passive spawns?: true
#启用天然敌对被动生成
Enable spawn points?: false
#启用刷新点？
Allow this MA installation to register the spawnpoint command?: true
Enable bonus spawns?: false
#启动奖金生成？
Enable naturalistic bonus spawns?: false
Hard cap on all mobs spawning: 1000000
#不要碰，除非你做一些严重疯狂的生成生物的速度
Main server spawn X (used for calculating wilderness spawn scaling): 0
Main server spawn Z (used for calculating wilderness spawn scaling): 0
Only enable bonus spawns on one world?: false#仅在一个世界启动奖金生成？
'Bonus spawn world name:': world#启动奖金生成的世界名
Only enable naturalistic bonus spawns on one selected world?: false
Naturalistic bonus spawn world name: world
Enable worldguard spawn flag checks?: false
Spawn individual wave mobs in the same spot?: false
Enable bonus spawns midair? (Useful for Ghasts): false
#启用在半空中奖金生成？ （有用的恶魂）
Enable custom monster health?: false#启动自定义怪物的健康？
Enable custom monster damage?: false
#启动自定义怪物的伤害？
Enable worldguard damage flag checks?: false
Enable Ender Dragons destroying blocks?: false
#末影龙可以破坏方块？
Enable Endermen picking blocks?: true
#小黑可以拿起方块？
Enable custom monster explosion properties? (Normal Creeper/Ghast): false
#启用自定义的怪物爆炸性能？ （普通爬行者/恶魂）
Enable spawning changes?: false
Enable custom monster drops?: false#启动自定义怪物的掉落物品？
Enable monsters destroying nearby torches?: false
Enable monsters attacking from a massive range?: false
Minimum distance sprint with their custom speed: 12
Mega-aggro range: 160
Mega-aggro range Y: 80
Use daytime mega-aggro range?: false
Daytime Mega-aggro range: 160
Daytime Mega-aggro range Y: 80
Enable Zombies attacking walls?: false
#启动僵尸破坏墙壁？
Enable Zombie wall destruction sounds?: true
Enable Zombie wall hit sounds?: true
Enable PigZombies attacking walls?: false
#启动僵尸猪人破坏墙壁？
Drop the block item when a Zombie destroys it?: true
#僵尸破坏一个方块时它会不会掉落
Enable worldguard 'enderman-grief' flag checks for all monster block operations?: false
Enable monsters nerdpoling? (Building straight up): false
Enable monsters airbridging? (Building across gaps): false
Kill the monster when it nerdpoles or airbridges?: false
Minimum frustration period before nerdpoling or airbridging: 10
Block to use for monsters building: DIRT
#怪物可以用来建筑的方块
Make wolves aggressive?: false
#使狼具有攻击性？
Make zombie pigmen aggressive?: false
#使僵尸猪人具有攻击性
Make zombie pigmen use mega-aggro?: false
Enable worldguard creeper explosion flag check for creepers, ghasts, and death explosions?: false
Check block spawn blacklist (deny spawn on these blocks)?: false
Invert block spawn list? (Make whitelist): false
Enable all other monster properties?: false
Bonus monsters per player: 4
Percent chance of spawning a monster in bonus waves: 100.0
Minimum light level to spawn: 0
#生成怪物的最小光照等级
Maximum light level to spawn: 7
#生成怪物的最大光照等级
Minimum bonus spawn distance: 24
Maximum bonus spawn distance: 80
Bonus spawn Y offset: 0
Bonus spawn period: 60000
Naturalistic bonus spawn mob attempts per tick: 10
Number of mobs to spawn in a spot if found: 1
Bonus distance max scale: 1.0
Max bonus distance from spawn before max spawns: 3000
Tick period for bonus natural spawns, increase this to drastically slow spawning: 1
Minimum naturalistic bonus spawn distance: 24
Maximum naturalistic bonus spawn distance: 160
Minimum light level to spawn naturalistic bonus: 0
Maximum light level to spawn naturalistic bonus: 7
Minimum Y for naturalistic bonus: 0
Maximum Y for naturalistic bonus: 255
Naturalistic distance max scale: 1.0
Max natural distance from spawn before max spawns: 3000
Automatically remove mobs who spawn inside blocks?: false
Action RPG mode! Milliseconds required between damage, vanilla=500: 500以下请看“config详解”


config详解

设置各个生物的增强效果

Bonus Spawns:奖金生成


Bat:
    spawn: false
    chance: 100.0

Naturalistic Bonus Spawns:自然怪物生成
//这部分是用来来控制怪物生成的比例。您将要算准100.1总数值。
//如果你的数值总数大于101.0时，小怪将产生同等比例
//例（所有小怪重生：真）：
Creeper：20.0，Zombie：20.0，骨架：20.0，蜘蛛：20.0，Enderman：19.0，EnderDragon：1.0（以上设置会导致有99％的其他怪物生成比例，和1％的魔影龙生成比例）
  Bat:
    spawn: false
    chance: 100.0
Monster Properties:怪物属性
  Ghast:    health: 10#怪物生命
    damage: 0#怪物攻击力
    standard explosion radius: 1.0#爆炸半径（仅苦力怕和恶魂有）
    standard fire: true#爆炸能否产生火焰


Advanced Monster Properties:高级怪物属性
  Blaze:
    true damage (completely ignores armor): 0
#穿甲伤害，无视盔甲防御
    explode on death: false
#死亡时爆炸？
    death explosion causes fire?: false
#死亡爆炸产生火焰？
    death explosion radius: 1.0
#死亡爆炸半径
    spawn new mob on death: false
#死亡时产生新的怪物？
    death spawn type: Blaze
#产生怪物种类
    death spawn count: 1
#产生怪物的数量
    death spawn chance: 100.0
#产生怪物的可能性（百分比）
    Immunities:
#怪物免疫的伤害：
      cactus: false
#仙人掌
      drowning: false
#溺水
      attacks: false
#近身攻击
      explosions: false
#炸死
      falling: false
#摔死
      fire: false
#烧死
      lava: false
#岩浆烫死
      projectiles: false
#被箭射死
————————————————————切割线————————————————————--
个别怪物特有：
 Mass aggro run speed: 1.0#怪物冲刺速度
————————————————————切割线————————————————————--
骷髅特有：超级狙击手
    Enable Super Arrows: false#启动超级箭头？    Super Arrow period: 5000#发射间隔（毫秒）    Super Arrow chance: 100.0#发射机率（百分比）    Super Arrow X/Z attack range: 20.0#发射范围（长度）    Super Arrow Y attack range: 80#发射范围（高度）    Make skeleton arrows explode?: false#箭头爆炸？    Arrow explosion radius: 2.0#爆炸半径    Arrow chance to explode on collision: 100.0#爆炸几率（百分比）    Arrow explosion causes fire?: false#引起火灾？


————————————————————切割线—————————————————————
僵尸特有：方块破坏者
    Use the new zombie destruction method, with block hp?: true#可以破坏方块？    Attackable blocks:    - block:seconds#可以破坏的方块，和破坏时间。例如：-DIRT:5    （泥土，5秒破坏）
Drops:怪物掉落
  Bat:
    drops:
    - item:count:chance
    - item:count:chance
    Overwrite?: false



梦魇模式：未理解，待补完。
原帖：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plu ... ges/nightmare-mode/

更新日志:

Version 15.0a notes:Fixed a bug where potion effect on-hit duration was in seconds rather than ticks.Removed the new gamerule lines.
Version 15.0 notes:Zombie world mode has been added! When enabled, it will instantly transform your config into a preconfigured zombie apocalypse, with no setup or downloads.To enable use: Automatically over-write relevant parts of config to zombie apocalypse for next run?: trueYou can now add potion effects to monsters dealing direct damage to players!Horses have been implemented.Mega-aggro was running at a very slow speed, monster speeds have been fixed. 2.0 speed is now VERY fast.You should no longer have silverfish spawn directly at players' feet when mega-aggro is enabled for pigzombies or spiders/cavespiders. You may still see them when mega-aggro is enabled for these mobs, disable it in advanced properties.Monsters which are building air bridges downwards will no longer suffocate players.Custom health has been updated to support 1.6.2.
Version 14.0d notes:Monsters can now only place blocks if they are standing on a block or swimming.
Version 14.0c notes:Added an option to disable Skeletons, WitherSkeletons, and PigZombies, according to each mob, from spawning with default equipment (allowing other plugins to set it instead)Fixed Spider mega-aggro, including a bug where silverfish would spawn at players' feet.
Version 14.0b notes:Fixed an old bug where PigZombies spawned without swords.Fixed a bug where turning off nerdpole/airbridge deaths would result in the feature not creating blocks.Fixed a bug where monsters could nerdpole through walls diagonally from above players. This could potentially still exist on 1-stair thick rooftops.
Version 14.0a notes:Fixed an old bug where zombies could not pillar in lava or water.Fixed a bug where zombies could catch themselves falling off an air bridge using a block, far below the bridge.
Version 14.0 notes:Converted Zombie Corpse Piling into Monster Nerdpoling and Air Bridging! Please update your configs to the new lines.Monsters will now build smarter with pillars and behave like players with blocks in their inventory to kill you.Once the delay period has passed, monsters will nerdpole up at full speed.Monsters can detect 2 block high walls and climb over.Air bridging will allow monsters to build horizontally through the air to reach players, moving the monster along its bridge and extending it.Air bridges can be built as a downward staircase, especially if monsters hit a deadly cliff dropoff.Zombies, Skeletons, Creepers, Wither Skeletons, and PigZombies may individually be enabled in the Advanced PropertiesThe Material used for building is the same for all mobsYou may still use this functionality as corpse piling with bridging disabled and "Kill the monster when it nerdpoles or airbridges?" enabled.This functionality is still compatible with CreeperHeal, and thus monster nerdpoles and bridges can be creeperhealed.
Added a protection method for players from exploding skeleton super arrows. When enabled, this will prevent arrows from exploding within a certain radius from players."Advanced Monster Properties.Skeleton.Super Arrow Player Protection Radius"





下载地址
全版本
备用地址(1.5.2)：http://pan.baidu.com/share/link?shareid=2216540949&uk=4078970807

恋今生 发表于 2013-8-9 10:45 
插件已经用上了，可是怪物血量mod显示怪物的血并没有变啊喂，比如僵尸 还是20点血 打第一下的时候只扣1点血 ...
Enable custom monster health?: true#启动自定义怪物的健康？
Enable custom monster damage?: true#启动自定义怪物的伤害？
这两个开启了没有？
还有怪物血量mod必须服务端 也装，否则怪物的血会显示一直不变有个怪物血量插件MobHealth，它兼容此插件
下载地址：http://dev.bukkit.org/bukkit-plugins/mobhealth/files/
